Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: Westbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester & 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester & 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/108th
ShortDescription: Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 109th, Wallace, 107th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/108th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 109th, Wallace, 107th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/108th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Talman
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, California, Armitage, & Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Talman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, California, Armitage, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Talman.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing 79th Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 79th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 79th due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available between 69th and 87th to provide connecting service. See station personnel for details.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
